info.name: ISN_Universal_API_Collection_v8.5-Hybrid-Final.postman_collection.json
info.description: Merged & reorganized master collection for IndicSubtitleNet v8.4-FR. Includes Adaptive Worker Routing, SQI, QA AutoRemediate, Prosody Alignment, full Providers (Google Vertex/Gemini/OpenAI), complete MDMS, Compliance v2, Observability+ and more.

_isn_metadata.notes: Merged Gemini + STT Hybrid extensions into base Universal Collection; adds Vertex AI training and real-time SQI features.
